fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Protect someone once per game.
- Use your shield once to protect yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, choose someone to protect.
- You cannot protect someone twice.
- If you successfully protect someone once, your armor will break. This will make the next successful protection fatal.
- If you cannot protect anyone anymore, you will commit suicide.
- Protecting someone will grant them Powerful defense.
- Your shield grants you Basic defense.
